content.detailedDescription: 1. was just waking up, went to the kitchen to make a cup of coffee. 2.It was a brightly lighted object in the sky. 3. at first i thought it was a helicopter and soon realized it was not. i observed the object thru rather powerful bincoculars. it had about 6 very bright white lights and approx. the same number of dimmer lights. it hovered for several minutes and rotated and seemed to slightly change shape at times. also for a short while some of the lights changed color from white to yellow.The object rotated what appeared to be it's nose toward an aircraft that was approaching it. 5. i felt it was certainly not an airplane nor a helicopter as it did not have anti collision light or traditional red and blue lights. i was a fighter plane crew chief in the usaf in the 1980's, so i have a familiarity with aircraft. my feelings were that i had seen this type of craft on two other occasions, the last one i reported to mufon. to be honest it looked beautiful, as if it were putting on a show .6. the craft gradually gained altitude until i could no longer see it even with binoculars.
content.summary: Rotating lighted disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my best friend had been gun deer hunting earlier in the day. it got dark so we left on her four wheeler and headed towards the top of cazy strip where my jeep was parked. we got their and seen some deer and put the lights on them and she tried to shoot the buck but i forgot and didn't load the gun back. we then drove my jeep which was 200 yards away from where we tried to shoot deer. when we was driving over to the jeep we seen a shooting star. when we were at the jeep i said look up at the sky, its a ufo she said no it isn't it is a satulite. i said no look how big it is it is to low and going to fast to be a satulite. then i held her and we watched it go in a straight line for about a minute then all at once it  stopped turned  bright red for about a second then disappeared or either went so fast we couldn't see. it was a very cold night which you could see the milky way and all the stars.It went in a straight line and it  was brighter than a star, but the same color. 

 after all that happened see we was planning on having sex before that. so we grabbed our blankets and did what we planned before that...

temp was around 35 or so

i am 32 and she was 23 at the time
content.summary: Star like in color, very clear night could see milky way, turned red and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing with my 8 month old grandson in my driveway when i first observed the objects in the sky. i happened to look at the sky because it was so clear and beautiful blue in a northeast direction at around 3:45 pm across the rooftops of the homes in the neighborhood. about 13 or 14 round white objects were in the sky traveling in a formation of three or four together and one in the front. the objects were not moving very fast and i watched them for about 6 or 7 minutes until i could not see them any longer. the objects made no noise and created no vapor trail as a regular aircraft would. when i went back inside my house i realized at about 7:30 pm that my cellphone signal booster had experienced a signal spike and had cut off my cellphone service. i have had this booster for over five years and i have never had a problem with this equipment and today after this sighting it malfunctions??
content.summary: Observed multiple round objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the hopi reservation to see the snake dance the next morning. there were no hotel openings.  we stayed on the roof of a native american's home with his young grandson.  the boy and my adopted son (20 years old) were both asleep.  the village, shongopavi, was on top of a mesa.  you could see several miles out in the valley.  i couldn't sleep.  as far out as i could see, i noticed an oval shape moving toward us.  it was a solid oval light, like when you shine a flashlight on the ground, only large from very far away.  i kept watching the ground as the oval came closer until i could see the source of the light on the ground.  i woke up both kids and said "i'm sorry to wake you up but nobody is going to believe this.  i want you to see it.  it was an oval object that came about 500 to 1,000 feet away from us and i think about 500 feet in the air.  it made no sound.  it looked like a thick piece of smoked glass or acrylic, 300-600 feet long on top of which were looked like skyscrapers, also looking like smoked glass or acrylic. they each appeared to be 20-40 stories high, with the middle one the tallest.  it appeared to be an elevator shaft because one of the multiple white light (that looked like lots of little christmas lights, only larger, moved up from the floor to the top.  it moved in a straight line, making no noise and there was no smoke or fire - it just silently glided along.  all three of us watched it.  we could see no signs of life on it, but there might have been.  it took a few minutes to pass by us and kept moving.

i came back to the reservation and saw the hopi boy about 5 years later.  i asked him if he ever saw it again.  he said it came by every night for about 30 days and that it landed in his uncle's field.  he and his mother pointed where it had landed.  he said that it left 3 large circular black spots where it landed.  i have talked to other hopi who said they see other unknown objects at hopi regularly.  it scares them so they try to ignore them.  i can provide the names of all 3 of us who saw the object.  it was not scary, just amazing.  i do know of another man who saw the same or similar thing in daylight not far from where we saw it.
content.summary: Observed from miles away until it came right by us

content.detailedDescription: At 10:15 i got up off the couch and decided to put the pool cleaner in the pool before getting in.  as i open the sliding doors in the back of my home (facing south) i looked up and saw (3) glowing red / orange balls at approximately 20 deg above the horizon.  they were approximately 2000 feet traveling north. as they got slightly north of straight up each one stopped and whet straight up until you couldn't see them any more. each one in a row. my wife witnessed it also. after the (3) were gone (1) glowing ball came from the same path and followed the other (3).  they made no noise at all. a total of (6) people including my wife and i.
content.summary: Large balls of red/orange light with structure underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a dark clear night. myself and a friend were on a cleared hillside behind my house and star gazing...Looking for satelites. spotting one coming from the west, we followed it when a movement from the northeast caught my eye. i said, "look, there's another one", and pointed. he acknowledged it and as we watched, it became apparent that they were going to cross paths at a very close distance. 

just as it looked like they might collide if at the same altitude, the object from the northeast shot off to the east. we both gasp at the rate of speed and simultaneously said, "did you see that"! knowing that satellites travel at tens of thousands mph it would have put the rate of speed of the ufo at hundreds of thousands mph...Not of this earth! it was literally gone in a second. we looked and the original satellite was still trudging along at about seventeen thousand mph and took several seconds before it eventually disappeared in the same direction.
content.summary: was moving from the ne and when it got to close proximity of a satelite moving across sky, it shot to the east and out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: When i was in the duty i heaved little time to rest so i layd down on the pipes and wach the sky. and then i heaved notised the little light moving very fest and very hi aboved me omoust hiding behind the stars and then two others heaved falow the one and serarch for it all over the stars. trust me i know how thinks can and cant move this hi. it was not just satelite or anythink like that. this was a ufos chaising another ufo. when they finaly find the other one anly the litle flash and then the two heaved just fly oway nice and ease. now you do andrstend thet a heaved not tel the story to twomany people becouse thay would think that iam crazy. but i know what i heaved seen.
content.summary: When i was in the duty i heaved little time to rest so i layd down on the pipes and wach the sky. and then i heaved notised the little light moving very fest and very hi aboved me omoust hiding behind the stars and then two others heaved falow the one

content.detailedDescription:
I see these things in the sky all the time.  i'm an outdoorsman and i know what a star looks like.  on the 4th was about 6 in the evening and i said to myself, you know what i got my camcorder out and charged the battery why not see if any things up in the sky to film, knowing i would probably see something i looked out the backdoor and sure enough right above the house and just to the north were 2 objects shining too bright to be stars so i hooked up the video recorder witch can zoom 150 x and started to film.  i cant believe the video i got of these things and you wont either when you see it. i have multiple days filmed now and will continue to film.  tonight i'm going to monks mound in collinsville and see if i can spot anything to film.  

the first time i noticed these type of objects in the sky was at the park just up the street from my house.  i was there with my kids and we were on the swing it was night out when i looked up and seen an orb flashing colors of blue and white and to me it looked like it was moving a little but staying in same general area, looking like a star.
content.summary: I looked out the door to see if i could find some ofd these objects and spotted 2 so i got my v/c and started filming.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in bed and felt something on me (think it was a bug or a hair - startled me as my nose suddenly felt something on it) so i woke up. i looked around the room and found nothing and thought i probably spooked myself. i looked out the window and noticed two red dots. they were tiny because they were really, really far away. they were just sitting there doing nothing then i saw a beam go from one toward the other. it was the same color as the two red dots. i look out my window a lot so i know there's nothing like this in that part of the sky. it's usually just black on a clear night like this. it lasted maybe 45 seconds then they vanished - just blinked out of existence. i'd say in the next 10 minutes or so there was a plane that crossed the sky. this is the second time i've seen red dots in the sky in my area. this time though they were in a different direction and a lot farther away. it was at 4:30 in the morning. i know i was wide awake as i went to the bathroom afterwards.
content.summary: Two red spheres in sky - beam of red light shoots from one to the other then they disappear

content.detailedDescription:
On aug, 16, 2013, ������10:48:38 pm, i had a rather unusual event happen while doing my usual night astral photography. i had my two still camera���s setup up a nikon coolpix 510-46x zoom, a canon sx30-35x zoom and two video camera���s  a canon vixia hg21-12x zoom, a panasonic sdr-s50-78x zoom. it wasn���t till the next day that i noticed that on my panasonic video camera had caught some extremely unusual activity on the moon.  a craft moves across the moon at a high rate of speed and lands in a crater named rima agatharchides after passing over the crater bullialdus. while the craft is moving across the moon from right to left it is constantly changing it shape. it has two arm extensions one on the top and one on the bottom that extends from the middle of the craft and rotate in opposite directions. when not in use these arm extension fold back into the craft to make it look cigar shaped as the top and bottom arm extensions rotate so does the main structure of the craft rotate.
all of this is very visible by watching the videos and frame grabs of craft 1. in the original video which i have not enclosed which has not been touched or edited it is only the first 3 minutes that i have investigated although the video is 15:56 minutes long so far i have been working on it constantly for 6 months to confirm the craft and compare it with other moon shots i have.  in the short version of the video at the beginning you will see the craft enter the moon ��� way down on the right side of the moon it is extremely fast so watch carefully you will see it go through a brown dead spot (more on that later) and go over the first crater causing dust to rise then watch the next crater as it lands in the crater. i slowed the video down and zoomed in and grabbed frames from the video (a few enclosed) and made a slide show with them i also edited the video down as short as possible and slowed it down and zoomed in and made another video as well as full speed.  where ever possible the video times are left in the frames.
i then proceeded to do some calculations on the craft this is what i came up with:
craft size ��� 43.558 miles (70.1 km)
distance covered ��� 2968 miles, time to cover -2968 miles=3.2 seconds
this gives it a speed of 927.5 miles per second or 3,339,000 mph
then it stopped in a heartbeat to land in a crater.
there are numerous frame grabs i have enclosed that i have worked on but they all come up with the same conclusion.

this is not a hoax and absolutely nothing has been faked or any misleading material sent to you. this has been a ongoing incident for many, many years all documented by video and pictures all untouched and will stand any forensic exam.
content.summary: The video taken on aug 16 2013 at 10:48, taken at milton ontario. the tripod mounted camera was facing 198 degrees south and 60 degrees above horizon with unlimited visibility.  night sky visibility was from 124 se to 304 nw  an angle from 35 dg to 90 dg

content.detailedDescription: See above --except at 6am its still there above the lake--i am 6 blocks west of lake in a 12 story hi-rise on 6th floor facing south.Can see east toward lake easily.The 5 or 6 lites are still visable and are not a cluster of stars--do not know why it does not move about----i have seen 2 exact clusters at same time and one of them moved away till out of site---i find it interesting to see---but wonder if any one ever experienced hovering no movement lites like this before????
content.summary: Looked out patio glass doors  saw a star s/w looked toward lake michigan andeast saw group of lites.

content.detailedDescription: Well my bestie and i where smokin a cigerette outside looking to  the westhills in my yard when we both saw this ufo watched it hover  slow in strraight line just hovering over our little 14,000population town ukiah ca.And i would also like to say i live next to a lake where my brother has witnessed ufo's comin out of the lake in the middle of the night when him and a friend where nite fishing.They where freaked..Thanx for having this site
content.summary: Well my bestie and i where smokin a cigerette outside looking to  the west

content.detailedDescription: i went outside my side door and lit a cigarette. as i took my first puff, a bright and brilliant green fireball streaked from the sky downward .. i was looking south, and the object came from left to right (west to east) probably at a 45 degree angle from where i was standing. it was very luminous, and left a streaking tail as it descended, but burned out. my guess is it was a meteor, however i am puzzled by the intensity of the green hue. it looked kind of like one of those flaming balls that gets shot out of a roman candle firework, however this object left no smoke trail as such a burning object would (also the object was descending, not ascending  ... looked more like an a neon electric streak, is how i can best describe what i saw. i have seen many meteors streak across the sky, but this one was much closer to the ground. the object did however streak at a very high rate of speed like that of a meteor... and most likely burned up in the atmosphere... but it had to have been quite a large chunk of something, made up of some material that glows vibrant green under such extreme heat as entry into earths atmosphere....Never have i seen such a green glowing meteor! also in the sky there was a commercial jet airliner. the pilots had to have witnessed the event for the object appeared to pass between the aircraft and me.  the time, was 11;10 pm give or take a minute or two because afterward i went and described the event to a couple of neighbors who were in their garage with the door open but did not see the object.   i seem to recall, seeing a video clip that came from a police patrol cars dash camera (think somewhere in usa midwest) of a green object streaking above and past the car. what i witnessed was similar but not quite as long of distance traveled... then again when observing objects in space , it is difficult to gauge height and distance due to lack of reference points.  whatever it was, it was quite a spectacular spectacle!!  other than the aircraft, there is a high probability that the object was seen by long beach airport control tower (lgb is sse approx 1.5 miles of my place).
content.summary: I have seen many "shooting stars" and meteor showers, but this was a very brilliant green light streaking toward the ground. almost like a roman candle firework flaming ball, but coming from the sky. descended in front of commercial jet. 11:10pm

content.detailedDescription:
i'm afraid i can't remember exactly when this happened. it was approximately 1986. i was about 8yrs old at the time. my younger brother was about 1 or 2. at the time, the only way my mom could get him to go to sleep for the night was to take him for a ride in the car. an uncle of mine who was living with us at the time would always go along as well. one night when they came home, they were both quite excited. they said they had seen a ufo. they described an object that was rectangular, estimated about 100ft long and 30 to 40ft wide with bars of white light on the bottom. it hovered in place for a few minutes and then suddenly rocketed away and disappeared. the next night when they came home, again they had seen something. the next night, again they saw something. the fourth night, i asked to come along. as i said before, i was about 8yrs old. what eight year old kid wouldn't want to see a real life starship? 

   (i should mention my father was in the military at the time and we lived near an airforce base. so even at the age of eight i was quite familiar with airplanes and helicopters.)

     we'd been riding around for about half an hour and i was keeping a constant vigil on the sky. i had a couple of separate sightings which i recognized right away as airliners. then i saw something that seemed out of place. it first appeared to be another airplane but it was much lower than the other two i had seen and was moving much slower. i saw three white lights. they formed a perfect triangle. the lights themselves were quite small. they looked about like stars but they were moving in unison so they certainly weren't stars. there was a dark mass between the lights so it had to be a solid object. i know that because it obscured the stars as it moved. as far as the size, it looked to be about the size of an airliner at an altitude between 500 and 1,000ft. i pointed it out to my mom and uncle. it was moving slow enough that we were able to follow it in our car for some distance. we actually got ahead of it at some point and it flew right over us. my mom and uncle dismissed it as an airplane. i continued watching it as we went on our merry way. a few minutes later, the craft changed from three white lights into one large white light and began to accelerate. my mother and uncle saw it too. suddenly it took off and vanished. it moved so quickly it left a streak of light in it's wake. about thirty seconds after it disappeared, three large airplanes flying one behind the other and quite close to each other, came from the direction of the airforce base. they were at about the same altitude as the ufo heading toward where it was when it disappeared. when they reached about where it had been they started flying in a circle. they remained there for i guess about ten minutes and then headed back toward the airforce base.

     i don't know what it was that we saw that night. soviet spy plane? experimental aircraft? alien starship? i don't know what it was. i'm not completely sure i want to know either. i only know two things for certain:

  1. whatever i saw that night, i never saw anything like it before. and aside from a few stories on tv and the net describing a similar craft, i've seen nothing like it in the 30yrs since.

  2. whatever it was, it got the attention of the airforce.
content.summary: I saw a triangle of 3 white lights over the city of fayettville. it moved to slowly to be an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out to the back yard and looked up and noticed a series of dull green light in a straight line pattern, then noticed another series of lights near the others and could clearly see they where connected by a solid boomerang shaped object, moving from west to east with a constant speed and direction. very high and appeared to be very large ( over 500 ft long). watched the object for 45 seconds before losing sight as it traveled se.
content.summary: Very large boomerang shaped craft flew over the las vegas valley. appeared to be very high elevation traveling west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out of my house to my brothers building who lives behind ours.
as i did i saw a large red craft going from north to south in the sky. i was about the size of a dump truck moving at a slow rate of seed. it made no noise and flew by in about 15 seconds. i truly tired of get look past of red light to see if i could get a better description, but the light was overwhelming. just a huge red ball, flying down my street ? no sound at all though.
content.summary: Was walking out of my house at 11 pm or so. going to see my brother who lives in the building behind mine. i saw a large red orb, or craft. about the size of a large van flying from south to north at a slow rate.

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed 3 bright orange lights traveling from the sw to ne soon joined by one more and quickly followed by 2 more. the first 3 hovered in a triangular formation while the other 3 danced around them. this group was then joined by 4 more moving in a single file. once it joined the group the first 6 were in 2 groups of 3 in triangular formation. the final four danced around the grouping of six. in a few minutes each of the orange balls grew smaller and dimmer and eventually just seemed to disappear
at the time i was sitting in my screened porch facing south. i quickly went inside to grab my cell phone and managed to take 15 second video. 
in the video you can see 4 or 5 of the lights. the brighter lights at the bottom of the frame are house lights from neighbors across the lake.
content.summary: {nd} 10 orange balls of light traveled from southwest to northeast across western suburb of boynton beach, fl

content.detailedDescription: While crossing the westmorland street bridge from south to north at 8:12 am on friday october 18th, 2013 while glancing over my right shoulder to change traffic lanes, i caught sight of an object moving slowly from the southeast toward the northwest that seemed to be glittering. as there was light traffic i had the time to observe this object about 7 seconds before it disappeared into the low level cloud. at first i thought it was the reflection from an aircraft but i watched it long enough to determine that it was definitely not. it appeared transluscent with brillant flashes occuring inside what appeared to be a quartz shell. the flashes were brillant as comparable to the sparks from an arc welder and they were occuring in extremely rapid succession throughout the interior of this quartz like object that had an irregularily shaped form. it was travelling very slowly and there was heavy cloud hanging very low over the city. this object stood out because it flashed bright light as it travelled beneath the cloud cover just above the level of buildings. the brillant light could not have been a reflection from the sun due to the extremely heavy cloud cover nor were any heavy duty lights being used in the area at this time of the morning. the object vanished into the cloud.
content.summary: Transluscent irregular shaped object similar to quartz

content.detailedDescription: While staying at a friends home in montana in june of 1993, awoke one day to discover classic scoop mark on left shin, five inches below the knee.  mark was half inch by three eights and oval in shape, color was taupe, surface of scoop was indented with a thin layer of taupe colored skin, showing a few wrinkles when touched. doctor examined it and could not explain it, told me to watch it.  it faded away with the skin thickening and leveling out in about a year.  forward thirteen years when google earth became available.  i looked for my friends property, which is a large ranch, and discovered a strange, bright object on the ground near the home, in the 1995 data base, two years after my scoop mark appearence.  the ground near this object is covered in a series of circular marks, strung out like hop landings.  this is the only year this object is seen on google earth.  i feel there is a connection between this object and my experience.  both myself and my friend had ufo sighting experiences in the past, prior to my visit.  i will try to attach the goole earth page image, it is quite interesting!  it is twelve feet across.
content.summary: Scoop mark on leg, subsequent discovery of "craft" on google earth

content.detailedDescription:
On the night and time in question i was driving north on veteran's expressway (589) approx. 2 miles south of the gunn highway exit.  

ahead and to the left  (nw)  i noticed what looked like 4 flickering lights in the sky.  at first i thought they were airliners on approach to tampa international airport, as the landing corridor runs along this north / south axis.   it was odd they they were in such a formation in my mind. the objects however were not connected in any way physically from what i observed.  the objects did not move in any peculiar ways to my observation.

as i was driving at 65 mph i could not easily stop and watch, but i tried to look as i drove for the next mile or so.  what i thought was 4 lights really was more like 11 as i cleared more trees.  the objects were soon on my left and and then the road curved and i lost site.

i have estimated the following based on speed of car and angle of observation:
the altitude of these lights was less than 500 ft..  
the field of objects was likely several hundred yards
the range from my car seemed relatively close


the appearance of the objects appeared like flickering flames in the distance. 

what intrigued me was the wide dispersal of the objects and their varying range and altitude.

i have a strong suspicion that they were sky lanterns, but, i found no advertised sky lantern events in tampa for the 8th of march and the chinese new moon celebration was on the 14th february.  it is of course possible that there was an event of some sort that i was unable to find or was a private affair.  if they were in fact sky lateens, given our perenial drought issues in the area, it doesn't seem like a particularly good idea. 

i suppose they also could have been hot air balloons or something of the like.  

also suspicious was that these were floating in a known landing path into tia.  i saw the lights of jetliners on the right side of the roadway acting in a normal way.  

i frankly have no idea what i saw, but felt this would be a good place to report something out of the ordinary.
content.summary: A series of 11+ flickering lights at different distances and altitudes.  flickered like flame.  floated in what looked like a constellation like formation.

content.detailedDescription: While have a family gathering that turned to a late night bonfire and discussing the recent activity of ufo s we all at the same time saw what looked like a light blue light drop from sky to ground very fast . it didn't have a tail and it just dropped straight down . it seemed to drop down in a farm field behind us . excitedly discussing this about 2 minutes later we saw another drop thing just further north of the first . we all got up and we just kinda freaking out and talking about it when we heard an ape like whooping close by . this is when i got nervous and i am a 40 yr grown man . there were 7 of us that witnessed this . the whooping happened about 4 times when we decided to investigate by going into the direction of the drop things. we never did find anything or hear anything else . i know this sounds crazy but this is what we witnessed . this is the 3rd ufo that i have seen here and plan on doing recording sessions this spring .
content.summary: While discussing ufo activity in the area 7 of us witnessed what looked like drop pods

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife went outside to close our animals down for the night and were standing at the edge of our newly cleared pasture . we were standing there talking when we saw a glowing orb at first thinking it was the neighbors with a flashlight .  the distance was about 100 feet away or so very close and would put them on our property . but instantly noticed the orb itself and it was traveling about 20 mph south about 4 feet above the ground weaving in and out of the trees .  when it would go behind a tree you could still see the light .  we were both terrified and don't know what it was .
content.summary: Glowing orb traveling in between trees

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son went out just before bed to get the nights fire wood .  we have a wood stove and it was starting to get late . we went to close the animals in the barn down for the night when we noticed a large very bright glowing thing in the sky .  the size was about as big as my little fingernail at arms length. we watched it to see if it was moving and it did descend and ascend slightly and move slightly side to side .  then it started to get smaller until it was a small star like  dot before it was so far away it faded out .  it leaving took about 5 seconds .  i explain it to people like taking a mag light and focusing the beam to a point . we were both excited about this and talk freely to friends and family .
content.summary: Me and my son saw a glowing orb while fetching the nights fire wood

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming out of the laundry facility at the la veta grand apartment complex on saturday, march 8, 2014, at approximately 1:18 pm (pst), when i noticed four (4) distinct white, circular objects hovering at a high altitude northeast of my location. the following draft sketch depicts what i saw:

                                                                     *    (white circle #1)
            <north                                            *    (white circle #2)                              south>
                                                                  *    (white circle #3)

                                                 *    (white circle #4)

upon sighting the objects, it appeared that "white circle #4" was slowly moving south and towards "white circles 1,2, and 3." these three objects remained stationary. object #4 got to the position depicted in the sketch above and also hovered for about 2-3 seconds. at that time, all four objects, in the same formation, slowly proceeded to move in a northerly direction for about 4-5 seconds at which time they quickly accelerated - until i lost sight of them. total time of sighting lasted about 20 seconds, i would put the position of the objects as being over orange, ca possibly above the 55 freeway and traveling northbound towards anaheim hills. 

visibility today was excellent. bright and sunny with no cloud cover. the moon was also clearly visible in the day sky. the objects made no sound and exhibited movements that could not be mistaken or misidentified as falling or stationary stars, asteroids, birds, or balloons. i am a retired us navy veteran and have been around all sorts of military aircraft throughout my 20-year career. these objects were not jet or turbo prop aircraft simply based on the physics of the objects' movement. the only possibility i could come up with was maybe they were helicopters at high altitude. however, they made no sound and they moved quicker than any helo i've ever seen.

i'll be curious and watching to see if anyone else reports this.
content.summary: White circles in formation hovering then traveling north over orange, ca, march 8, 2014

content.detailedDescription: I went to ciggaret. i saw something on sky. i thinked it is a bird, then i noticed there are two!! objects flying same direction with exactly same speed, it were rectangles with light on corners. it flied from west to east. i was scared. the objects just dissapiered after about 10 seconds. ..Sorry for bad english.
content.summary: Two rectangles with lights on sides same speed

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway when i heard a jet so i looked up at it,the moon was showing in the sky just above it.I noticed what appeared to be a satellite passing over the plane in an eastward direction,the object suddenly zigged to the north as if to follow the plane the quickly zagged southward to it's original position and returned to an eastward direction disappearing out of sight.This entire sighting lasted only approx. 30 seconds and was directly above the los angeles harbor complex.
content.summary: I looked up to observe a passing passenger jet and saw a ufo pass over the plane.

content.detailedDescription: This is a video i shot (facing south) with a galaxy s4 of an object hovering (probably over lake dora from my perspective). i was sitting on my front steps in mount dora florida on feb. 18th 2014 @ 10:22 p.M. e.S.T.. the object made no noise. it sat there for a few minutes then as i called my wife out to take a look slowly it moves off to the left of the screen (towards the end you will see it go behind a tree) still with no sound. i watched it continue southeast until it was out of sight.
content.summary: An object hovering  in mount dora florida on feb. 18th 2014

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter, who was 6 at the time, saw a disc in the field across the street.  she asked me what it was.  i looked out the window and saw it was a ufo.  i took the children, 2 at that time, 2 houses down to see it.  it rose up off the field slowly.  i saw that white lights went one way around the rim of the disc, while red lights went another way in a circle in the center of the disc.  i thought to myself that i would like a closer look at it.  that is when it rose up slowly on its side and came towards us rising sideways.  it was enormous.  my kids ran home.  i did too.  i smelled something in the air.  a month later, i had viral pneumonia.  i also have suffered from colon cancer which is not something in the family.  i have seen one once before 10 years prior in sauk village.  after this incident, i saw this disc come over the horizon towards the house for 2 weeks straight.  my oldest daughter still fears them.  i have no memory of abduction.  i finally left that area years later.  i did not fear this object until it turned on its side to go up.  it was so big it frightened me as well.  i called the police and reported it.  they said it was a blimp.  they refused to listen.  75 calls came in to the richton park police and they ignored it.  i drew a picture for a deputy in will county who then chased it. i had pneumonia for 2 months.  i almost died from it.  i think now it was radiation poisoning.
     i have recently had a blackhawk copter fly over my house.  don't know why but it rattled my windows.  it stopped when i put the event on facebook. most of my friends on there are states attorneys and police officers.  im a retired state worker. 
   now i wonder if this has been all through my life.  my parents put a window lock on my bedroom because i was scared as a child that someone would come in.  i used to sleep under all the blankets with my head covered so something couldn't see me.  dreamt of my room being a rocket ship over and over again. odd stuff.
content.summary: Daughter saw disc in field across the street.  we went out to see it.  i raised sideways while ascending slowly above the wires and stopped outside our house. children and i ran home.  we were 2 doors down.  called police and they did nothing.  75 reports

content.detailedDescription: I was at my boyfriend's apartment and we were leaving his apartment to get in my parked car that was in the alley next to his building. we were sitting in the car listening to music and talking with the sun roof open. so then we started to look up at the stars and we both seen about 10 or so black flying helicopters or something flying in a v like shape. the black flying objects kind of looked like birds because they were small but they were moving too fast and it was about 10pm at night to be birds. so then the black objects flew off into the distance. so we both got out off of the car to get a better look at the sky and that is when i saw a reptile bird like creature with feathers and wings. and i knew that is was a bird because i could see the wings flapping like a bird but also the feathers were blowing in the wind. the creature was like a pterodactyls because it was huge and it look like a mix of reptile and a bird. i only seen the bird for less then a minute and it flew off behind the apartment building. the weird thing about these sighting are that i also seen another flying object at the same location. but it was about a year earlier. i seen the other flying object in the same way around the same time in the car in the alley next to the new carver apartments in downtown los angeles. this flying object was different from the black objects and the bird like creature. it was brown moving in a waving motion or moving like a snake in the sky. it was also like a hover craft because it looked like it was floating in the sky. once my boyfriend and i saw this object it shape-shifted into the color of the sky. and we both could feel the energy of the flying object it was almost like the flying object knew we were looking at it. but we could still see it in its cloud form. after less that a min of looking at it somehow we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Reptile bird like creature with wings and feathers

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house in the backyard taking a smoke break. it was night and there were some clouds but i was still able to see the stars. as i was stargazing i was also watching the airplanes in the sky. five minutes into my smoke break and stargazing, i noticed an object in the far distance that was brighter and more colorful than the stars or airplanes. i stopped and observed it, seeing if its flight pattern was normal. it wasn't. it hovered and it was oval shaped with livid lights, it ascended then descended in an vertical direction. i was frantic because it didn't make any noises like the other airplanes nor did it fly like one. then closer to me in the sky was another irregular fly craft. it was a glowing orb and it made impulsive and turbulent moves in the sky. it went behind the cloud, it advanced to the other unknown craft, or hectically flew around like nothing i had seen. it then jolted to the other object and it went dim. i didn't know what i saw and that's what frightened me the most. i ran in to tell my step mom and boyfriend and to grab my ipod to get evidence but the original object was already gone and my family laughed it off. it was the first time i ever saw something like this and it wouldn't be the last time either.
content.summary: Ufo was hovering in distance with another ufo closer to me (witness).
